fields.title: How safe is my IP Address?
fields.body: Your connection is proxied and your IP is never sent to us.

fields.title: How safe is my Minecraft Information?
fields.body: Your username and UUID is stored to verify you and can be accessed by staff.

fields.title: How safe is my Discord Information?
fields.body: Your username is stored to verify you and can be accessed by staff.

fields.title: Do you store anything else?
fields.body: Anything mods/datapacks and the game generate for them to properly work.
